messages.MSG_HEADER: RSS Telegram Bot - Auto Setup Script
messages.MSG_DOCKER_MISSING: Docker not found! Please install Docker first.
messages.MSG_RECREATE: Do you want to recreate it? (y/n):
messages.MSG_ENTER_INFO: Please follow the steps below to enter your details:
messages.MSG_STEP_TOKEN:
--- STEP 1: GETTING TELEGRAM BOT TOKEN ---
1. Open Telegram app.
2. Search for @BotFather and start the bot.
3. Send /newbot command.
4. Give your bot a name (e.g., News Bot).
5. Give your bot a username (e.g., news_rss_bot - must end with 'bot').
6. BotFather will give you an 'HTTP API Token'.
7. Copy that long code and paste it below.
(Paste ONLY the code, not the whole message!)
messages.MSG_STEP_CHATID:
--- STEP 2: GETTING YOUR CHAT ID ---
1. Search for @userinfobot on Telegram and start it.
2. The bot will automatically send you your 'Id' number.
3. Copy this number and paste it below.
messages.MSG_STEP_AI:
--- STEP 3: AI ANALYSIS SETTINGS (OPTIONAL) ---
If you want AI to comment on the news:
1. Go to https://openrouter.ai/ and sign up.
2. Create a new API Key in the 'Keys' section.
3. Copy the key and paste it below.
(If you don't want this, just press Enter to skip)
messages.MSG_FEEDS_INTRO: Select the sources you want to follow from the list below.
messages.MSG_FEEDS_INSTRUCT: Type the number and press Enter to toggle. Type 'd' when done.
messages.MSG_FEEDS_NONE: No sources selected! Default list will be used.
messages.MSG_FEEDS_RECREATE: Do you want to reconfigure RSS list? (y/n):
messages.MSG_CHATID_EMPTY: Error: Chat ID cannot be empty!
messages.MSG_AI_MODEL_PROMPT: Model to use (Press Enter for default):
messages.MSG_DONE_SUCCESS: Your bot is now running in the background.
messages.MSG_OPML_PROMPT: Do you want to import feeds from an OPML file? (y/n):
messages.BOT_GREETING: üëã Hello! I'm the RSS News Bot.
messages.BOT_COMMANDS:
Commands:
/latest - Get the last 5 news items
/search <keyword> - Search in news
/subscribe <url> - Add a new RSS feed
/topicid - Get current topic ID
/setlang - Change language
